rows.label: tlk41200123_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Rule 1 of the Driver's code:
Think of all others
as your sisters and brothers!

rows.label: tlk41200123_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, hey! I'm reciting the Driver's code.
It's an important part of my training!

rows.label: tlk41200123_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Yep! My trainer told me that you
need a deep sense of self if you want
to resonate with a Core Crystal!

rows.label: tlk41200123_04_msg0004
rows.name:
The more tender your heart, the
better the chance you'll have of
resonating with a good Blade!

rows.label: tlk41200123_04_msg0005
rows.name:
Rule 2 of the Driver's code:
If there's a person in trouble,
help out on the double!
